short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage your cookie preferences with a simple toggle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CookieBuddy is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you manage cookie consent banners effortlessly. 

With a simple toggle, you can automatically accept or deny cookies on any website, saving you time and reducing interruptions while browsing. 

No more manually clicking through annoying cookie popupsâ€”CookieBuddy does it for you! 

Designed for seamless functionality, it ensures you're in control of your cookie preferences with just one click.
